name: Meta
description: A complex attribute containing resource metadata.  All "meta" sub-attributes are assigned, by the service provider (have a "mutability" of "readOnly"), and all of these sub-attributes have a "returned" characteristic of "default". This attribute SHALL be ignored when provided by clients.

attributes.name: meta
attributes.description: the meta attribute

subAttributes.name: resourceType
subAttributes.description: The name of the resource type of the resource. This attribute has a mutability of "readOnly" and "caseExact" as "True".

subAttributes.name: created
subAttributes.description: The "DateTime" that the resource was added to the service provider. This attribute MUST be a DateTime.

subAttributes.name: lastModified
subAttributes.description: The most recent DateTime that the details of this resource were updated at the service provider. If this resource has never been modified since its initial creation, the value MUST be the same as the value of "created".

subAttributes.name: location
subAttributes.description: The URI of the resource being returned. This value MUST be the same as the "Content-Location" HTTP response header (see Section 3.1.4.2 of [RFC7231])

subAttributes.name: version
subAttributes.description: The version of the resource being returned. This value must be the same as the entity-tag (ETag) HTTP response header (see Sections 2.1 and 2.3 of [RFC7232]). This attribute has "caseExact" as "True".  Service provider support for this attribute is optional and subject to the service provider's support for versioning (see Section 3.14 of [RFC7644]).  If a service provider provides "version" (entity-tag) for a representation and the generation of that entity-tag does not satisfy all of the characteristics of a strong validator (see Section 2.1 of [RFC7232]), then the origin server MUST mark the "version" (entity-tag) as weak by prefixing its opaque value with "W/" (case sensitive).

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the SCIM Resource as defined by the Service Provider.

attributes.name: externalId
attributes.description: A String that is an identifier for the resource as defined by the provisioning client.The service provider MUST always interpret the externalId as scoped to the provisioning domain.

attributes.name: displayName
attributes.description: A human-readable name for the Group. REQUIRED.

attributes.name: members
attributes.description: A list of members of the Group.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: Identifier of the member of this Group.

subAttributes.name: $ref
subAttributes.description: The uri corresponding to a SCIM resource that is a member of this Group.

subAttributes.name: display
subAttributes.description: A human-readable name for the Member

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: A label indicating the type of resource, e.g. 'User' or 'Group'

name: Schema
description: Specifies the schema that describes a SCIM schema

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The unique URI of the schema. When applicable, service providers MUST specify the URI.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The schema's human-readable name. When applicable, service providers MUST specify the name, e.g., 'User'.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: The schema's human-readable name. When applicable, service providers MUST specify the name, e.g., 'User'.

attributes.name: attributes
attributes.description: A complex attribute that includes the attributes of a schema.

subAttributes.name: name
subAttributes.description: The attribute's name.

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: The attribute's data type. Valid values include 'string', 'complex', 'boolean', 'decimal', 'integer', 'dateTime', 'reference'.

subAttributes.name: multiValued
subAttributes.description: A Boolean value indicating an attribute's plurality.

subAttributes.name: description
subAttributes.description: A human-readable description of the attribute.

subAttributes.name: required
subAttributes.description: A boolean value indicating whether or not the attribute is required.

subAttributes.name: canonicalValues
subAttributes.description: A collection of canonical values. When applicable, service providers MUST specify the canonical types, e.g., 'work', 'home'.

subAttributes.name: caseExact
subAttributes.description: A Boolean value indicating whether or not a string attribute is case sensitive.

subAttributes.name: mutability
subAttributes.description: Indicates whether or not an attribute is modifiable.

subAttributes.name: returned
subAttributes.description: Indicates when an attribute is returned in a response (e.g., to a query).

subAttributes.name: uniqueness
subAttributes.description: Indicates how unique a value must be.

subAttributes.name: referenceTypes
subAttributes.description: Used only with an attribute of type 'reference'.  Specifies a SCIM resourceType that a reference attribute MAY refer to, e.g., 'User'.

subAttributes.name: multipleOf
subAttributes.description: The value of "multipleOf" MUST be a number, strictly greater than 0. A numeric instance is valid only if division by this keyword's value results in an integer.

subAttributes.name: minimum
subAttributes.description: The value of "minimum" MUST be a number, representing an inclusive lower limit for a numeric instance. If the instance is a number, then this keyword validates only if the instance is greater than or exactly equal to "minimum".

subAttributes.name: maximum
subAttributes.description: The value of "maximum" MUST be a number, representing an inclusive upper limit for a numeric instance. If the instance is a number, then this keyword validates only if the instance is less than or exactly equal to "maximum".

subAttributes.name: maxLength
subAttributes.description: The value of this keyword MUST be a non-negative integer. A string instance is valid against this keyword if its length is less than, or equal to, the value of this keyword. The length of a string instance is defined as the number of its characters as defined by RFC 8259 [RFC8259].

subAttributes.name: minLength
subAttributes.description: The value of this keyword MUST be a non-negative integer. A string instance is valid against this keyword if its length is greater than, or equal to, the value of this keyword. The length of a string instance is defined as the number of its characters as defined by RFC 8259 [RFC8259]. Omitting this keyword has the same behavior as a value of 0.

subAttributes.name: pattern
subAttributes.description: The value of this keyword MUST be a string. This string SHOULD be a valid regular expression, according to the Java regular expression dialect. A string instance is considered valid if the regular expression matches the instance successfully.

subAttributes.name: minItems
subAttributes.description: The value of this keyword MUST be a non-negative integer. An array instance is valid against "minItems" if its size is greater than, or equal to, the value of this keyword. Omitting this keyword has the same behavior as a value of 0.

subAttributes.name: maxItems
subAttributes.description: The value of this keyword MUST be a non-negative integer. An array instance is valid against "maxItems" if its size is less than, or equal to, the value of this keyword.

subAttributes.name: notBefore
subAttributes.description: The value of this keyword MUST be a dateTime. It will verify that a given dateTime will not a have a value that is before this dateTime.

subAttributes.name: notAfter
subAttributes.description: The value of this keyword MUST be a dateTime. It will verify that a given dateTime will not a have a value that is after this dateTime.

subAttributes.name: subAttributes
subAttributes.description: Used to define the sub-attributes of a complex attribute.

name: Service Provider Configuration
description: Schema for representing the service provider's configuration

attributes.name: documentationUri
attributes.description: An HTTP-addressable URL pointing to the service provider's human-consumable help documentation.

attributes.name: patch
attributes.description: A complex type that specifies PATCH configuration options.

subAttributes.name: supported
subAttributes.description: A Boolean value specifying whether or not the operation is supported.

attributes.name: etag
attributes.description: A complex type that specifies ETag configuration options.

subAttributes.name: supported
subAttributes.description: A Boolean value specifying whether or not the operation is supported.

attributes.name: bulk
attributes.description: A complex type that specifies bulk configuration options.

subAttributes.name: supported
subAttributes.description: A Boolean value specifying whether or not the operation is supported.

subAttributes.name: maxOperations
subAttributes.description: An integer value specifying the maximum number of operations.

subAttributes.name: maxPayloadSize
subAttributes.description: An integer value specifying the maximum payload size in bytes.

attributes.name: filter
attributes.description: A complex type that specifies FILTER options.

subAttributes.name: supported
subAttributes.description: A Boolean value specifying whether or not the operation is supported.

subAttributes.name: maxResults
subAttributes.description: An integer value specifying the maximum number of resources returned in a response.

attributes.name: changePassword
attributes.description: A complex type that specifies configuration options related to changing a password.

subAttributes.name: supported
subAttributes.description: A Boolean value specifying whether or not the operation is supported.

attributes.name: sort
attributes.description: A complex type that specifies sort result options.

subAttributes.name: supported
subAttributes.description: A Boolean value specifying whether or not the operation is supported.

attributes.name: authenticationSchemes
attributes.description: A complex type that specifies supported authentication scheme properties.

subAttributes.name: name
subAttributes.description: The common authentication scheme name, e.g., HTTP Basic.

subAttributes.name: description
subAttributes.description: A description of the authentication scheme.

subAttributes.name: specUri
subAttributes.description: An HTTP-addressable URL pointing to the authentication scheme's specification.

subAttributes.name: documentationUri
subAttributes.description: An HTTP-addressable URL pointing to the authentication scheme's usage documentation.

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: The authentication scheme. This specification defines the values "oauth", "oauth2", "oauthbearertoken", "httpbasic", and "httpdigest".  REQUIRED.

name: ResourceType
description: Specifies the schema that describes a SCIM resource type

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The resource type's server unique id. May be the same as the 'name' attribute.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The resource type name. When applicable, service providers MUST specify the name, e.g., 'User'.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: The resource type's human-readable description. When applicable, service providers MUST specify the description.

attributes.name: endpoint
attributes.description: The resource type's HTTP-addressable endpoint relative to the Base URL, e.g., '/Users'.

attributes.name: schema
attributes.description: The resource type's primary/base schema URI.

attributes.name: schemaExtensions
attributes.description: A list of URIs of the resource type's schema extensions.

subAttributes.name: schema
subAttributes.description: The URI of a schema extension.

subAttributes.name: required
subAttributes.description: A Boolean value that specifies whether or not the schema extension is required for the resource type.  If True, a resource of this type MUST include this schema extension and also include any attributes declared as required in this schema extension. If False, a resource of this type MAY omit this schema extension.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the SCIM Resource as defined by the Service Provider.

attributes.name: externalId
attributes.description: A String that is an identifier for the resource as defined by the provisioning client.The service provider MUST always interpret the externalId as scoped to the provisioning domain.

attributes.name: userName
attributes.description:
A service provider's unique identifier for the user, typically
used by the user to directly authenticate to the service provider.Each User MUST include a non-empty userName value.  This identifier
MUST be unique across the service provider's entire set of Users.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description:
The components of the user's real name.Providers MAY return just the full name as a single string in the
formatted sub-attribute, or they MAY return just the individual component attributes using the other sub-attributes, or they MAY
return both.  If both variants are returned, they SHOULD be describing the same name, with the formatted name indicating how the
component attributes should be combined.

subAttributes.name: formatted
subAttributes.description:
The full name, including all middle names, titles, and suffixes as appropriate, formatted for display
(e.g., 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

subAttributes.name: familyName
subAttributes.description:
The family name of the User, or last name in most Western languages (e.g., 'Jensen' given the full
name 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

subAttributes.name: givenName
subAttributes.description:
The given name of the User, or first name in most Western languages (e.g., 'Barbara' given the
full name 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

subAttributes.name: middleName
subAttributes.description: The middle name(s) of the User (e.g., 'Jane' given the full name 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

subAttributes.name: honorificPrefix
subAttributes.description:
The honorific prefix(es) of the User, or title in most Western languages (e.g., 'Ms.' given the full name
'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

subAttributes.name: honorificSuffix
subAttributes.description:
The honorific suffix(es) of the User, or suffix in most Western languages (e.g., 'III' given the full name
'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

attributes.name: displayName
attributes.description:
The name of the User, suitable for display
to end-users.  The name SHOULD be the full name of the User being described, if known.

attributes.name: nickName
attributes.description:
The casual way to address the user in real life, e.g., 'Bob' or 'Bobby' instead of 'Robert'.  This attribute
SHOULD NOT be used to represent a User's username (e.g., 'bjensen' or 'mpepperidge').

attributes.name: profileUrl
attributes.description:
A fully qualified URL pointing to a page
representing the User's online profile.

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: The user's title, such as \"VicePresident.\"

attributes.name: userType
attributes.description:
Used to identify the relationship between the organization and the user.  Typical values used might be
'Contractor', 'Employee', 'Intern', 'Temp', 'External', and 'Unknown', but any value may be used.

attributes.name: preferredLanguage
attributes.description:
Indicates the User's preferred written or
spoken language.  Generally used for selecting a localized user interface; e.g., 'en_US' specifies the language English and country

attributes.name: locale
attributes.description:
Used to indicate the User's default location
for purposes of localizing items such as currency, date time format, or numerical representations.

attributes.name: timezone
attributes.description:
The User's time zone in the 'Olson' time zone
database format, e.g., 'America/Los_Angeles'.

attributes.name: active
attributes.description: A Boolean value indicating the User's administrative status.

attributes.name: password
attributes.description:
The User's cleartext password.  This attribute is intended to be used as a means to specify an initial
password when creating a new User or to reset an existing User's password.

attributes.name: emails
attributes.description:
Email addresses for the user.  The value SHOULD be canonicalized by the service provider, e.g.,
'bjensen@example.com' instead of 'bjensen@EXAMPLE.COM'.Canonical type values of 'work', 'home', and 'other'.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description:
Email addresses for the user.  The value SHOULD be canonicalized by the service provider, e.g.,
'bjensen@example.com' instead of 'bjensen@EXAMPLE.COM'.Canonical type values of 'work', 'home', and 'other'.

subAttributes.name: display
subAttributes.description: A human-readable name, primarily used for display purposes.  READ-ONLY.

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: A label indicating the attribute's function, e.g., 'work' or 'home'.

subAttributes.name: primary
subAttributes.description: A Boolean value indicating the 'primary' or preferred attribute value for this attribute, e.g., the psreferred mailing address or primary email address.  The primary attribute value 'True' MUST appear no more than once.

attributes.name: phoneNumbers
attributes.description:
Phone numbers for the User.  The value SHOULD be canonicalized by the service provider according to the
format specified in RFC 3966, e.g., 'tel:+1-201-555-0123'.Canonical type values of 'work', 'home', 'mobile', 'fax', 'pager

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: Phone number of the User.

subAttributes.name: display
subAttributes.description: A human-readable name, primarily used for display purposes.  READ-ONLY.

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: A label indicating the attribute's function, e.g., 'work', 'home', 'mobile'.

subAttributes.name: primary
subAttributes.description:
A Boolean value indicating the 'primary' or preferred attribute value for this attribute, e.g., the preferred
phone number or primary phone number.  The primary attribute value 'True' MUST appear no more than once.

attributes.name: ims
attributes.description: Instant messaging addresses for the User.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: Instant messaging address for the User.

subAttributes.name: display
subAttributes.description: A human-readable name, primarily used for display purposes.  READ-ONLY.

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: A label indicating the attribute's function, e.g., 'aim', 'gtalk', 'xmpp'.

subAttributes.name: primary
subAttributes.description:
A Boolean value indicating the 'primary' or preferred attribute value for this attribute, e.g., the preferred
messenger or primary messenger.  The primary attribute value 'True' MUST appear no more than once.

attributes.name: photos
attributes.description: URLs of photos of the User.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: URLs of photos of the User.

subAttributes.name: display
subAttributes.description: A human-readable name, primarily used for display purposes.  READ-ONLY.

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: A label indicating the attribute's function, i.e., 'photo' or 'thumbnail'.

subAttributes.name: primary
subAttributes.description:
A Boolean value indicating the 'primary' or preferred attribute value for this attribute, e.g., the preferred
phone number or primary phone number. The primary attribute value 'True' MUST appear no more than once.

attributes.name: addresses
attributes.description:
A physical mailing address for this User.
Canonical type values of 'work', 'home', and 'other'.  This attribute is a complex type with the following sub-attributes.

subAttributes.name: formatted
subAttributes.description:
The full mailing address, formatted for display or use with a mailing label.  This attribute MAY contain
newlines.

subAttributes.name: streetAddress
subAttributes.description:
The full street address component, which may include house number, street name, P.O. box, and multi-line
extended street address information.  This attribute MAY contain newlines.

subAttributes.name: locality
subAttributes.description: The city or locality component.

subAttributes.name: region
subAttributes.description: The state or region component.

subAttributes.name: postalCode
subAttributes.description: The zip code or postal code component.

subAttributes.name: country
subAttributes.description: The country name component.

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: A label indicating the attribute's function, e.g., 'work' or 'home'.

subAttributes.name: primary
subAttributes.description:
A Boolean value indicating the 'primary' or preferred attribute value for this attribute.  The primary
attribute value 'True' MUST appear no more than once.

attributes.name: groups
attributes.description:
A list of groups to which the user belongs,
either through direct membership, through nested groups, or dynamically calculated.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The identifier of the User's group.

subAttributes.name: $ref
subAttributes.description: The uri of the corresponding 'Group' resource to which the user belongs.

subAttributes.name: display
subAttributes.description: A human-readable name, primarily used for display purposes. READ-ONLY.

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: A label indicating the attribute's function, e.g., 'direct' or 'indirect'.

attributes.name: entitlements
attributes.description: A list of entitlements for the User that represent a thing the User has.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The value of an entitlement.

subAttributes.name: display
subAttributes.description: A human-readable name, primarily used for display purposes.  READ-ONLY.

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: A label indicating the attribute's function.

subAttributes.name: primary
subAttributes.description:
A Boolean value indicating the 'primary' or preferred attribute value for this attribute.  The primary
attribute value 'True' MUST appear no more than once.

attributes.name: roles
attributes.description: A list of roles for the User that collectively represent who the User is, e.g., 'Student', 'Faculty'.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The value of a role.

subAttributes.name: display
subAttributes.description: A human-readable name, primarily used for display purposes.  READ-ONLY.

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: A label indicating the attribute's function.

subAttributes.name: primary
subAttributes.description: A Boolean value indicating the 'primary' or preferred attribute value for this attribute.  The primary attribute value 'True' MUST appear no more than once.

attributes.name: x509Certificates
attributes.description: A list of certificates issued to the User.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The value of an X.509 certificate.

subAttributes.name: display
subAttributes.description: A human-readable name, primarily used for display purposes.  READ-ONLY.

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: A label indicating the attribute's function.

subAttributes.name: primary
subAttributes.description: A Boolean value indicating the 'primary' or preferred attribute value for this attribute.The primary attribute value 'True' MUST appear no more than once.

attributes.name: employeeNumber
attributes.description: Numeric or alphanumeric identifier assigned to a person, typically based on order of hire or association with an organization.

attributes.name: costCenter
attributes.description: Identifies the name of a cost center.

attributes.name: organization
attributes.description: Identifies the name of an organization.

attributes.name: division
attributes.description: Identifies the name of a division.

attributes.name: department
attributes.description: Identifies the name of a department.

attributes.name: manager
attributes.description: The User's manager.  A complex type that optionally allows service providers to represent organizational hierarchy by referencing the 'id' attribute of another User.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The id of the SCIM resource representing the User's manager.  REQUIRED.

subAttributes.name: $ref
subAttributes.description: The URI of the SCIM resource representing the User's manager.  REQUIRED.

subAttributes.name: displayName
subAttributes.description: The displayName of the User's manager. OPTIONAL and READ-ONLY.
